answers.answer:
Jawaban:

6.) ....... Mary reading a book in her classroom at this moment?

a. Is

b. am

c. was

d. Were

7 Susan and Susanna ......... writing poems for an English cubiect now

a. is

b. Are

c. Am

d. Be

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan menggunakan bentuk Present Continuous Tense. Nomor 6. karena subjeknya Mary, maka Tobe nya adalah a. is.

Nomor 7. karena subjeknya Susan dan Susanna, maka Tobe nya adalah b. are.

related_questions.question:
Read the following text to answer the q.    Pink Beach
Last holiday I went to Komodo island. There is a gorgeous beach which has pink colored-sand. The
beach is called Pink Beach or Pantai Merah Muda,
Il's a huge beach with a calm wave. When I looked it closely, I could see that it actually an ordinary
white beach sand. But there are a lot of crushed corals and minerals that make it looks pink. Pink beach is a
special beach, There's no one beach in this world has a beautiful pink sand like this.
1. What is the text about?
2. Where is it located ?
3. Why the sand has pink color?
4. Why does the writer think that Pink Beach is a special one?
5.
" ....... It actually an ordinary white beach sand."
What is the Indonesian translation of the underlined word ?​

answers.answer:
1. Pink beach

2. Komodo Island

3. Because a lot of crushed corals and minerals make the sand looks pink

4. because there's no one beach in this world has a beautiful pink sand like that

5. mana kata bergaris bawah nya?

semoga bermanfaat.

1.pink beach

2.in comodo island

3.Because that is a gorgeous beach

4.Because that's beach verry langkah

5.pantai merah.

SEMOGA TIDAK MEMBANTU

related_questions.question: Suatu segitiga siku-siku yang panjang sisinya a 8 cm dan b 15 cm panjang sisi c nya adalah​

answers.answer:
Penjelasan:

Segitiga siku-siku adalah segitiga yang besar sudut pada sisi tegak lurusnya adalah 90°. Pada segitiga siku-siku berlaku teorema Pythagoras yang berbunyi besar kuadrat sisi miringnya sama dengan jumlah kuadrat dua sisi siku-sikunya.

Ingat!!!

Rumus teorema Pythagoras

c² = a² + b²

Diketahui:

panjang sisi siku-siku 1 = a = 15 cm

panjang sisi siku-siku 2 = b = 8 cm

Ditanya: berapa panjang sisi miring segitiga siku-siku tersebut?

Jawab:

Pada soal diketahui panjang sisi siku-siku 1 = a = 15 cm dan panjang sisi siku-siku 2 = b = 8 cm

Maka penyelesaian dari soal di atas menggunakan teorema Pythagoras.

c² = a² + b²

c² = (15 cm)² + (8 cm)²

c² = 225 cm² + 64 cm²

c² = 289 cm²

c = √(289 cm²) = 17 cm

Jadi, panjang sisi miring segitiga siku-siku yang panjang sisi siku-sikunya 15 cm dan 8 cm adalah 17 cm.

Teorema Phytagoras =

  • [tex] \sqrt{ {8}^{2} } + {15}^{2} = [/tex]
  • [tex] \sqrt{64 + 225} = [/tex]
  • [tex] \sqrt{289} = [/tex]
  • 17 cm
  • Jadi, panjang c ( sisi miring ) = 17 cm

Semoga membantu.. Jangan dihapus jawaban saya... =)
